Law Union and Rock Insurance PLC Company Profile

Law Union and Rock Insurance Plc is a United Kingdom-based insurance company. The Company's segments include Motor, Fire, General accident, Marine and aviation, Oil and gas, Engineering, and Bond and credit. The Company offers motor insurance, fire insurance, burglary insurance, householder and house owners comprehensive insurance, group personal accident insurance, all risks insurance, general third-party liability insurance, marine insurance, professional indemnity insurance, goods-in-transit insurance, money insurance, fidelity guarantee insurance, engineering insurance, oil and gas, operation extra expenses, cargo, onshore property, legal liabilities, construction erection, business interruption and bonds. It offers general insurance and risk management solutions. It provides compensation for loss or damage to items caused by any accident, such as wearing apparels, jewelry and personal ornaments, pens, gold and silver wares, cameras, laptops and mobile phones.
